summary: Professional mobile-friendly business website for BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES - an agricultural products sales platform with admin CMS for managing products, prices, and contact details. Customers view products and call to order (no online payments).
architectural_notes: Website type: Business/E-commerce catalog (no payment processing)
Target audience: Agricultural product customers who will call to order
Admin system: Single-user authentication for owner-only access
No user registration for customers - public browsing only
Product management: Full CRUD with image uploads
Call-to-action: Click-to-call buttons throughout (no cart or checkout)
Theme: Green agriculture aesthetic with crop/farm imagery
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Agriculture hero image showing green crop fields and blue sky for home page header (hero-agriculture.dim_1920x600.png)
- Farmer in field illustration showing person working with crops for about page (farmer-working.dim_800x600.png)
- Fresh vegetables and crops product photo showing variety of agricultural produce (products-showcase.dim_1200x800.png)
- Agriculture contact background with field landscape for contact page (contact-background.dim_1600x900.png)
- Wheat or grain close-up photo for page decorative elements (grain-texture.dim_600x400.png)
- Green tractor icon or illustration for business branding (tractor-icon.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Home page (/home or /) with agriculture-themed hero section, business name 'BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES' prominently displayed, business introduction text fetched from backend BusinessInfo, and a 'View Products' button that navigates to the Products page

Create a Products page (/products) with a responsive grid layout displaying product cards. Each card shows: product image, product name, current price, short description, and a 'Call to Order' button that opens the device's phone dialer with the business contact number from backend

Create a Product Details page (/products/:id) displaying: large product image, full product description, current price, product name, and a 'Click to Call' button that opens the device's phone dialer with the business contact number
Create an About Us page (/about) displaying information about BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES fetched from backend BusinessInfo.aboutText field, with agriculture-themed styling

Create a Contact page (/contact) displaying: business phone number (clickable to call), business email (clickable mailto link), business address, and a simple contact form with fields for name, email, phone, and message. All contact details are fetched from backend BusinessInfo

Implement admin authentication UI with Internet Identity integration: Login button in header (visible when not authenticated), Logout button in header (visible when authenticated as admin), protected route wrapper that redirects non-admin users away from admin pages
Create an Admin Dashboard page (/admin) accessible only to authenticated admin, with navigation to: Manage Products, Edit Business Info sections. Display current business name and admin status

Create an Admin Products Management page (/admin/products) with: product listing table showing name, price, and actions; 'Add New Product' button opening a form modal; Edit button for each product opening edit form modal; Delete button with confirmation dialog; Forms include fields for name, price, short description, full description, and image URL input with preview

Create an Admin Business Info Editor page (/admin/business-info) with a form to edit: Business Name, Contact Phone, Contact Email, Business Address, About Text. Include Save button and success/error feedback

Implement a responsive navigation header component visible on all pages with: Business logo/name, navigation links (Home, Products, About, Contact), Admin/Login button (context-sensitive), mobile hamburger menu for small screens. Use green agriculture color scheme

Apply mobile-responsive design across all pages using Tailwind CSS responsive utilities, ensuring layouts adapt properly for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports. Product grids should show 1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3-4 on desktop

Apply a consistent green agriculture theme throughout the website with: Primary green color (#22c55e or similar agricultural green) for buttons and accents, earth tones for backgrounds, clean typography, nature-inspired design elements. Use Tailwind's color utilities

Add HTML meta tags for SEO optimization including: page titles describing each page, meta descriptions for main pages, Open Graph tags for social sharing with business name and description, mobile viewport meta tag

Display generated agriculture-themed images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated. Include hero image on Home page, product placeholder images on Products page, and background images for About and Contact pages

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with agriculture theme, business intro, and View Products button
Products page with grid layout showing product cards with image, name, price, description, and Call to Order button
Product details page with large image, full description, price, and click-to-call button
About Us page with business information
Contact page with editable phone, email, and contact form
Admin authentication system with secure login/logout (single admin user)
Admin CMS to add/edit/delete products with image upload
Admin ability to update product prices anytime
Admin ability to edit business contact details (phone, email, address)
Mobile-responsive design with green agriculture theme
Create a backend data model for Product with fields: id (Text), name (Text), price (Float), shortDescription (Text), fullDescription (Text), imageUrl (Text), createdAt (Int), updatedAt (Int)
Create a backend data model for BusinessInfo with fields: businessName (Text), contactPhone (Text), contactEmail (Text), businessAddress (Text), aboutText (Text)

Implement backend authentication using Internet Identity with a single admin principal stored in stable memory. Include functions: isAdmin(caller: Principal) -> Bool, and protect all write operations (add/edit/delete products, update business info) to require admin authentication

Implement backend CRUD operations for products: addProduct(name, price, shortDescription, fullDescription, imageUrl) -> Result<Product, Text>, updateProduct(id, name, price, shortDescription, fullDescription, imageUrl) -> Result<Product, Text>, deleteProduct(id) -> Result<(), Text>, getProduct(id) -> ?Product, getAllProducts() -> [Product]. All write operations must verify admin authentication

Implement backend functions for business info management: getBusinessInfo() -> BusinessInfo (public), updateBusinessInfo(businessName, contactPhone, contactEmail, businessAddress, aboutText) -> Result<BusinessInfo, Text> (admin only). Initialize with default values: businessName = 'BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES', contactPhone = '+1234567890', contactEmail = 'contact@bajarangi.com', businessAddress = 'Business Address', aboutText = 'About BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES'
